Re: Returned mail for inmate Epstein
From
To
Date 2019/09/25 09:31
Subject: Re: Returned mail for inmate Epstein
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Hi
The letter looks like it was addressed to He's the former doctor for the U.S. Female Gymnastics Team that was convicted of molesting a bunch of girls (including Aly Raisman and Simone Biles) under the guise of "medical procedures/examinations." Some of the victim accounts are pretty horrific.
Thanks,
Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, NY 10007
p: 646-836-
f: 646-836-7665
>>
Hi
When I picked up the mail from the mail room this morning there was a letter for inmate Epstein. It appeared he mailed it out and it was returned back to him. I am not sure if I should open it or should we hand it over to anyone?
Special Investigative Technician
MCC New York
150 Park Row
New York, NY 10007
646-836-6300 Ext
Page 3434
DOJ-OGR-00023835
